title: Belkin Convertible Magnetic Charging Stand 15W - MagSafe-Compatible Fast Qi2 Charger for Apple iPhone 15, 14, 16, 16 Plus, 16 Pro, 16 Pro Max, Airpods Pro, & More - Black Black Pad/Stand - Power Supply Included
description: FAST CHARGE plus NEW QI2 TECHNOLOGY: Conveniently place your phone on the magnetic charging pad/stand to fast charge your iPhone or Qi2 compatible device up to 15W. With Qi2, you get adaptive charging for more speed and safety features

top_reviews.title: Great quality, poor portability
top_reviews.body: Donâ€™t waste your time with other stands, this one works the best, only issue is portability. If the stand folded it would be an ideal product. This charger is of much higher quality compared to the past two I had. Read more
